Extract CNAs.

Source: R/getters.R
CNA.Rd

Getter to obtain copy number calls from an object.

CNA(x, type = c("clonal", "subclonal"))

Arguments

x

A CNAqc object.

type

"clonal" for clonal CNAs, "subclonal" for subclonal CNAs.

Value

A tibble with the data.

Examples

data("example_PCAWG", package = 'CNAqc')
CNA(example_PCAWG)
#> # A tibble: 667 × 17
